publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6011 Bill Wilson: Renfrew Ferry Savedâ€”That the Parliament notes the awarding of a new Renfrew ferry service contract to Silvers Marine; congratulates Silvers Marine on winning this contract, and also congratulates Renfrewshire Council and all those who campaigned to overturn the original decision of the Labour-dominated Strathclyde Partnership for Transport to close the 500-year-old Renfrew ferry.
S3M-6011 Renfrew Ferry Saved (lodged on 19 March 2010) Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stewart Maxwell*
